footer.description: Discover and share the best locations you've visited with our community of travelers and explorers worldwide.

review.title: Share Your Experience
review.subtitle: Help others discover this amazing place
review.placeholder: What made this place special? Share details about your visit, the atmosphere, accessibility, or any tips for future visitors...

about.title: About MapMark
about.subtitle: Discover, share, and explore the world's most amazing places with our global community of travelers.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that every place has a story to tell. MapMark connects travelers worldwide, allowing them to discover hidden gems, share authentic experiences, and create lasting memories through the power of community-driven exploration.

discover.title: Discover Places
discover.description: Find amazing locations around the world through our interactive map and community recommendations.

review.title: Share Reviews
review.description: Rate and review places you've visited to help other travelers make informed decisions.

global.title: Global Community
global.description: Connect with travelers from around the world and access content in 12 different languages.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To create the world's most comprehensive and trusted platform for location discovery, where every traveler can find their next adventure and share their unique perspective with the global community.

cta.title: Ready to Explore?
cta.description: Join thousands of travelers who are already discovering amazing places with MapMark.

ua.title: Про нас
ua.description: Ласкаво просимо до нашого додатку – платформи, яка допомагає вам відкривати та ділитися найкращими локаціями, які ви відвідали. Ми прагнемо створити спільноту активних мандрівників і дослідників, де кожен може залишити реальні відгуки та корисні поради для інших користувачів. Наш додаток дозволяє: позначати улюблені місця та відстежувати, де ви вже були; ділитися власними враженнями та рейтингами локацій; рекомендувати готелі, ресторани, кафе, транспортні послуги та інші сервіси; допомагати іншим користувачам відкривати приховані або маловідомі місця. Ми віримо, що кожна поїздка стає цікавішою, коли досвід спільноти допомагає приймати рішення. Наша мета – зробити подорожі легшими, безпечнішими та надихаючими для кожного.

en.title: About Us
en.description: Welcome to our app – a platform designed to help you discover and share the best locations you've visited. We aim to build a community of active travelers and explorers where everyone can leave authentic reviews and helpful tips for others. Our app allows you to: mark your favorite places and track where you've been; share your personal experiences and location ratings; recommend hotels, restaurants, cafes, transport services, and other amenities; help other users discover hidden or lesser-known spots. We believe every trip becomes more enjoyable when community experience guides your choices. Our goal is to make travel easier, safer, and more inspiring for everyone.

es.title: Sobre Nosotros
es.description: Bienvenido a nuestra aplicación: una plataforma diseñada para ayudarte a descubrir y compartir los mejores lugares que has visitado. Nuestro objetivo es construir una comunidad de viajeros activos y exploradores donde todos puedan dejar reseñas auténticas y consejos útiles para otros. Nuestra aplicación te permite: marcar tus lugares favoritos y rastrear dónde has estado; compartir tus experiencias personales y calificaciones de ubicaciones; recomendar hoteles, restaurantes, cafés, servicios de transporte y otras comodidades; ayudar a otros usuarios a descubrir lugares ocultos o menos conocidos. Creemos que cada viaje se vuelve más agradable cuando la experiencia de la comunidad guía tus decisiones. Nuestro objetivo es hacer que viajar sea más fácil, seguro e inspirador para todos.

fr.title: À Propos de Nous
fr.description: Bienvenue dans notre application – une plateforme conçue pour vous aider à découvrir et partager les meilleurs endroits que vous avez visités. Nous visons à construire une communauté de voyageurs actifs et d'explorateurs où chacun peut laisser des avis authentiques et des conseils utiles pour les autres. Notre application vous permet de : marquer vos endroits préférés et suivre où vous avez été ; partager vos expériences personnelles et évaluations de lieux ; recommander des hôtels, restaurants, cafés, services de transport et autres commodités ; aider d'autres utilisateurs à découvrir des endroits cachés ou moins connus. Nous croyons que chaque voyage devient plus agréable quand l'expérience communautaire guide vos choix. Notre objectif est de rendre les voyages plus faciles, sûrs et inspirants pour tous.

de.title: Über Uns
de.description: Willkommen in unserer App – einer Plattform, die Ihnen hilft, die besten Orte zu entdecken und zu teilen, die Sie besucht haben. Wir möchten eine Gemeinschaft aktiver Reisender und Entdecker aufbauen, in der jeder authentische Bewertungen und hilfreiche Tipps für andere hinterlassen kann. Unsere App ermöglicht es Ihnen: Ihre Lieblingsorte zu markieren und zu verfolgen, wo Sie waren; Ihre persönlichen Erfahrungen und Ortsbewertungen zu teilen; Hotels, Restaurants, Cafés, Transportdienste und andere Annehmlichkeiten zu empfehlen; anderen Benutzern zu helfen, versteckte oder weniger bekannte Orte zu entdecken. Wir glauben, dass jede Reise angenehmer wird, wenn Gemeinschaftserfahrung Ihre Entscheidungen leitet. Unser Ziel ist es, das Reisen für alle einfacher, sicherer und inspirierender zu machen.

it.title: Chi Siamo
it.description: Benvenuti nella nostra app – una piattaforma progettata per aiutarti a scoprire e condividere i migliori luoghi che hai visitato. Miriamo a costruire una comunità di viaggiatori attivi ed esploratori dove ognuno può lasciare recensioni autentiche e consigli utili per gli altri. La nostra app ti permette di: segnare i tuoi luoghi preferiti e tracciare dove sei stato; condividere le tue esperienze personali e valutazioni dei luoghi; raccomandare hotel, ristoranti, caffè, servizi di trasporto e altre comodità; aiutare altri utenti a scoprire luoghi nascosti o meno conosciuti. Crediamo che ogni viaggio diventi più piacevole quando l'esperienza della comunità guida le tue scelte. Il nostro obiettivo è rendere i viaggi più facili, sicuri e ispiranti per tutti.

pt.title: Sobre Nós
pt.description: Bem-vindos ao nosso aplicativo – uma plataforma projetada para ajudá-lo a descobrir e compartilhar os melhores lugares que você visitou. Nosso objetivo é construir uma comunidade de viajantes ativos e exploradores onde todos possam deixar avaliações autênticas e dicas úteis para outros. Nosso aplicativo permite: marcar seus lugares favoritos e rastrear onde você esteve; compartilhar suas experiências pessoais e avaliações de locais; recomendar hotéis, restaurantes, cafés, serviços de transporte e outras comodidades; ajudar outros usuários a descobrir lugares ocultos ou menos conhecidos. Acreditamos que cada viagem se torna mais agradável quando a experiência da comunidade orienta suas escolhas. Nosso objetivo é tornar as viagens mais fáceis, seguras e inspiradoras para todos.

ru.title: О Нас
ru.description: Добро пожаловать в наше приложение – платформу, созданную для того, чтобы помочь вам открывать и делиться лучшими местами, которые вы посетили. Мы стремимся создать сообщество активных путешественников и исследователей, где каждый может оставлять подлинные отзывы и полезные советы для других. Наше приложение позволяет: отмечать ваши любимые места и отслеживать, где вы были; делиться личным опытом и оценками мест; рекомендовать отели, рестораны, кафе, транспортные услуги и другие удобства; помогать другим пользователям открывать скрытые или малоизвестные места. Мы верим, что каждое путешествие становится приятнее, когда опыт сообщества направляет ваши решения. Наша цель – сделать путешествия проще, безопаснее и вдохновляющими для всех.

ja.title: 私たちについて
ja.description: 私たちのアプリへようこそ – あなたが訪れた最高の場所を発見し、共有するために設計されたプラットフォームです。私たちは、誰もが他の人のために本物のレビューや役立つヒントを残すことができる、アクティブな旅行者と探検家のコミュニティを構築することを目指しています。私たちのアプリでは：お気に入りの場所をマークし、どこに行ったかを追跡する；個人的な体験と場所の評価を共有する；ホテル、レストラン、カフェ、交通サービス、その他のアメニティを推薦する；他のユーザーが隠れた場所や知られていない場所を発見するのを助ける。コミュニティの経験があなたの選択を導くとき、すべての旅行がより楽しくなると信じています。私たちの目標は、すべての人にとって旅行をより簡単で、安全で、インスピレーションに満ちたものにすることです。

zh-CN.title: 关于我们
zh-CN.description: 欢迎使用我们的应用程序——一个旨在帮助您发现和分享您访问过的最佳地点的平台。我们的目标是建立一个活跃的旅行者和探险家社区，每个人都可以为他人留下真实的评论和有用的提示。我们的应用程序允许您：标记您最喜欢的地方并跟踪您去过的地方；分享您的个人经历和地点评级；推荐酒店、餐厅、咖啡馆、交通服务和其他便利设施；帮助其他用户发现隐藏或鲜为人知的地方。我们相信，当社区经验指导您的选择时，每次旅行都会变得更加愉快。我们的目标是让每个人的旅行更轻松、更安全、更有启发性。

ar.title: معلومات عنا
ar.description: مرحباً بكم في تطبيقنا – منصة مصممة لمساعدتكم في اكتشاف ومشاركة أفضل الأماكن التي زرتموها. نهدف إلى بناء مجتمع من المسافرين النشطين والمستكشفين حيث يمكن للجميع ترك مراجعات أصيلة ونصائح مفيدة للآخرين. يتيح لكم تطبيقنا: وضع علامة على أماكنكم المفضلة وتتبع أين كنتم؛ مشاركة تجاربكم الشخصية وتقييمات الأماكن؛ التوصية بالفنادق والمطاعم والمقاهي وخدمات النقل والمرافق الأخرى؛ مساعدة المستخدمين الآخرين في اكتشاف الأماكن المخفية أو الأقل شهرة. نؤمن أن كل رحلة تصبح أكثر متعة عندما تقود تجربة المجتمع اختياراتكم. هدفنا هو جعل السفر أسهل وأكثر أماناً وإلهاماً للجميع.

hi.title: हमारे बारे में
hi.description: हमारे ऐप में आपका स्वागत है – एक प्लेटफ़ॉर्म जो आपको उन बेहतरीन स्थानों की खोज और साझाकरण में मदद करने के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया है जहाँ आप गए हैं। हमारा लक्ष्य सक्रिय यात्रियों और खोजकर्ताओं का एक समुदाय बनाना है जहाँ हर कोई दूसरों के लिए प्रामाणिक समीक्षाएँ और उपयोगी सुझाव छोड़ सकता है। हमारा ऐप आपको अनुमति देता है: अपने पसंदीदा स्थानों को चिह्नित करना और ट्रैक करना कि आप कहाँ गए हैं; अपने व्यक्तिगत अनुभव और स्थान रेटिंग साझा करना; होटल, रेस्तराँ, कैफे, परिवहन सेवाओं और अन्य सुविधाओं की सिफारिश करना; अन्य उपयोगकर्ताओं को छुपे हुए या कम ज्ञात स्थानों की खोज में मदद करना। हम मानते हैं कि जब समुदाय का अनुभव आपकी पसंद का मार्गदर्शन करता है तो हर यात्रा अधिक आनंददायक हो जाती है। हमारा लक्ष्य सभी के लिए यात्रा को आसान, सुरक्षित और प्रेरणादायक बनाना है।

ads.title: Advertisements
ads.description: Here you can find everything you need - from housing to services. Use smart filters for quick search!

form.locationPlaceholder: Describe where the object is located

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.subtitle: Learn how MapMark uses cookies to enhance your experience

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and improving our services.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.description: We use different types of cookies to enhance your experience on MapMark:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enhance your experience by remembering your choices and preferences.

examples.mapSettings: Map view preferences and zoom levels

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our website so we can improve it.

examples.usage: Website usage statistics and popular features
examples.performance: Page load times and performance metrics

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies:

maps.title: Map Services (Leaflet/OpenStreetMap)
maps.description: Used to display interactive maps and location data

analytics.title: Analytics Services
analytics.description: Help us understand user behavior and improve our services

manageCookies.title: Managing Your Cookies
manageCookies.description: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:

browsers.chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies and other site data
browsers.firefox: Settings > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
browsers.edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions > Cookies and site data

consent.title: Cookie Consent
consent.description: By using MapMark, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy. We may ask for your explicit consent for certain types of cookies.
consent.withdrawal: You can withdraw your consent at any time by adjusting your browser settings or contacting us directly.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us:
contact.addressText: MapMark Privacy Team, 123 Travel Street, Explorer City, EC 12345

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using MapMark

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using MapMark, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

services.title: Description of Service
services.description: MapMark is a platform that allows users to discover, share, and review locations worldwide. Our services include:

features.map: Interactive world map with location markers
features.reviews: User-generated reviews and ratings for locations
features.recommendations: Personalized location suggestions based on preferences

userAccount.title: User Accounts
userAccount.description: To access certain features of MapMark, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.

responsibilities.title: Your Responsibilities:
responsibilities.accurate: Provide accurate and complete information when creating your account
responsibilities.security: Maintain the security of your password and account
responsibilities.activities: Accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.description: You retain ownership of any content you submit, post or display on MapMark. By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive license to use, display, and distribute your content on our platform.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Content:
prohibited.illegal: Content that is illegal, harmful, or violates any laws
prohibited.harmful: Harassment, hate speech, or discriminatory content
prohibited.spam: Spam, misleading information, or fraudulent content
prohibited.copyright: Content that infringes on intellectual property rights

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the Service, to understand our practices.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever including breach of the Terms.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: In no event shall MapMark, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
contact.addressText: MapMark Legal Team, 123 Travel Street, Explorer City, EC 12345

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we protect your data.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: MapMark is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect information you provide directly to us and information we obtain automatically when you use our services:

items.name: Name and contact information
items.location: Location data when you share reviews

items.interactions: How you interact with our service

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.description: We use the information we collect for various purposes:

purposes.service: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
purposes.personalization: To personalize your experience and recommendations
purposes.communication: To communicate with you about updates and features
purposes.improvement: To analyze usage patterns and improve our platform

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:

exceptions.title: We may share information when:
exceptions.legal: Required by law or to respond to legal process
exceptions.safety: Necessary to protect the safety of users or the public
exceptions.business: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction:

measures.title: Security Measures:
measures.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.description: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:

rights.access: Access and review your personal information
rights.deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
rights.portability: Request a copy of your data in a portable format

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience. Please see our Cookie Policy for detailed information about our use of cookies.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the revision date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
contact.addressText: MapMark Privacy Team, 123 Travel Street, Explorer City, EC 12345

helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using MapMark

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: MapMark is designed to help you discover and share amazing places around the world. Here's how to get started:

explore.title: Explore the Map
explore.description: Use the interactive world map to browse locations. Zoom in and out, drag to move around, and discover places that interest you.

click.title: Click on Locations
click.description: Click on any location marker to see details, existing reviews, and ratings from other travelers.

review.title: Share Your Experience
review.description: Add your own reviews and ratings to help other travelers discover great places and avoid disappointing ones.

map.title: Interactive World Map
map.description: Explore locations worldwide with our easy-to-use interactive map interface.

reviews.title: Real User Reviews
reviews.description: Read authentic reviews and ratings from travelers who have actually visited these places.

filters.title: Smart Filters
filters.description: Filter locations by country, category, or use the quick filter to find exactly what you're looking for.

languages.title: Multiple Languages
languages.description: Access MapMark in 12 different languages to make your experience more comfortable.

steps.find: Find the location you want to review on the map
steps.click: Click on the location marker to open the details popup
steps.write: Click 'Add Review' and write your honest experience
steps.rate: Give a star rating from 1 to 5 stars
steps.publish: Click 'Publish Review' to share with the community

navigation.title: Map Navigation
navigation.zoom: Use mouse wheel or +/- buttons to zoom in and out
navigation.drag: Click and drag to move around the map
navigation.search: Use the search bar to find specific locations
navigation.filters: Apply filters to show only certain types of places

account.question: Do I need an account to use MapMark?
account.answer: You can browse locations and read reviews without an account. However, to add your own reviews and save favorite places, you'll need to create a free account.

reviews.question: How do I write a good review?
reviews.answer: Be honest and specific about your experience. Include details about what made the place special, accessibility, best times to visit, and any tips for future visitors.

languages.question: Can I change the language?
languages.answer: Yes! MapMark supports 12 languages. You can change the language using the language selector in the header.

mobile.question: Does MapMark work on mobile devices?
mobile.answer: Absolutely! MapMark is fully responsive and works great on smartphones and tablets. You can access all features on any device.

contact.title: Need More Help?
contact.description: If you can't find the answer to your question, don't hesitate to contact our support team:

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.subtitle: Get in touch with our team
contactUs.description: Have a question, suggestion, or need help with MapMark? We'd love to hear from you! Our team is here to assist you with any inquiries about our platform, features, or your travel experiences.

discoverPlaces.title: Discover Amazing Places
discoverPlaces.subtitle: Explore the world through authentic reviews and recommendations from fellow travelers

featured.title: Featured Categories
featured.description: Find the perfect places for your next adventure based on what you love most:

nature.title: Natural Wonders
nature.description: Breathtaking landscapes, national parks, beaches, and outdoor adventures

culture.title: Cultural Heritage
culture.description: Museums, historical sites, art galleries, and cultural landmarks

food.title: Food & Dining
food.description: Local restaurants, street food, cafes, and culinary experiences

adventure.title: Adventure & Sports
adventure.description: Hiking trails, water sports, extreme activities, and outdoor challenges

browse.title: Browse Places
browse.description: Explore our interactive map or browse by categories to find interesting locations

read.title: Read Reviews
read.description: Get insights from real travelers who have visited these places before

plan.title: Plan Your Visit
plan.description: Use the information and tips to plan your perfect trip

cta.title: Ready to Explore?
cta.description: Start discovering amazing places around the world with MapMark today!
